plugin.name: Enhanced Slug
label: Enhanced Slug
description: Generates a slug from another field (Pinyin/Translate).
settings.title: Enhanced Slug Settings
options.title: Configuration
options.sourceField.label: Source Field Name
options.sourceField.description: API ID of the field to generate the slug from (e.g., title).
options.advanced.required.label: Required field
options.advanced.required.description: You won't be able to create an entry if this field is empty
